name: The Backyardigans: Mission to Mars
summary: Calling all astronauts! When Tyrone and Tasha receive a strange signal at Mission Control, Commander Uniqua needs you to suit up with her, Science Officer Pablo, and Equipment Specialist Austin for their mission to Mars! Help pilot the shuttle, race through a meteor shower, explore underground Martian caves, collect space gems, and more in an out-of-this-world adventure with The Backyardigans!
